title: 579. Peter Schrager Joins to Talk Earl Thomas' Release & Hard Knocks
itunes:title: 579. Peter Schrager Joins to Talk Earl Thomas' Release & Hard Knocks
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. Peter Schrager of "Good Morning Football" joins the guys for the podcast. To start off, the trio react to Earl Thomas' release from the Ravens (1:17). Next, Peter Schrager comments on Giants head coach Joe Judge's approach to coaching (7:08). To follow that, the guys look at what the Jets have done this offseason (11:12). Then, Peter Schrager gives insight into "Hard Knocks" and further talks about the two head coaches in it (14:51). After that, the trio discuss what to expect from Patriots QB Cam Newton this season (18:17). Next, the guys examine the value of Chiefs rookie RB Clyde Edwards-Helaire and mention other rookies to keep an eye on (22:15). To wrap up the show, Peter Schrager gives his surprise team for 2020 (26:40).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
